name: coClarity
tag_list: enterprise-2, enterprise, web-2, information, overload, communication, collaboration, web2ireland, web2, enterprise2, software-as-a-service, saas
overview:
coClarity is an Internet based platform, which helps people work together more productively. Think of coClarity as a shared web space where you can manage business-critical interactions with colleagues, customers and suppliers. Weâ€™ve taken a fresh look at the “information overload” problem and discovered a unique solution that streamlines projects of all sizes.

Most people still use email to coordinate projects. The average knowledge worker sends and receives 25,000 emails every year and spends 28% of their day managing email. Imagine the beneï¬ts of freeing up some of this time? Web 2.0 collaboration tools improve on email and allow you to share tasks or documents within a group. These tools work well on medium-sized projects. With coClarity, you can coordinate projects of any size.

coClarity fills the gap between web-based task sharing and enterprise workflow solutions.

coClarity is currently in private beta with 42 companies in Ireland, UK, & USA and will launch in April-2009.
